  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CommandLineArgumentsGatherer<P>
    ParameterGather that gathers parameters from command line arguments.
    DefaultParametersErrorHandler
    The default handler of errors reported by Jackson.
    DirGatherer<P>
    ParameterGather that gathers parameters from files in a directory.
    EnvironmentVariablesGatherer<P>
    ParameterGather that gathers parameters from environment variables.
    FileWatcher
    A convenience class for performing file watches on multiple dirs with a delay after each change to allow batches of changes to complete before being processed.
    JavadocCapturer
    Annotation processor for capturing Javadoc comments and converting them to annotations that can be understood by Params4J.
    MixIn
    Representation of a MixIn added via the Params4JFactory.withMixIn(java.lang.Class, java.lang.Class).
    Params4JFactoryImpl<P>
    Implementation of the Params4JFactory.
    Params4JImpl<P>
    Implementation of Params4J and Params4JSpi.
    ResourceGatherer<P>
    The ResourceGatherer loads a single resource file, which can be properties, JSON or YAML.
    SecretsGatherer<P>
    A ParameterGatherer that collects parameters from a directory hierarchy.
    SecretsWalker
    FileVisitor used by SecretsGatherer to construct a JSON ObjectNode containing files from the root directory.
    SystemPropertiesGatherer<P>
    ParameterGather that gathers parameters from Java system properties.
